titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elisha Winkler.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Deborah A. Richards. 2006-03-30

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: This collection is in 1 folder and contains a department flyer, an exam, and a professor's report on the students' performance on the exam.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Ancient Studies was first introduced at Smith College as an interdepartmental major with the academic year 1970-1971.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Ancient Studies program records contain materials describing a lecture and an exam within the department. Types of materials include a department flyer, an exam, and a professor's report on the students' performance on the exam.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Ancient Studies Program Records, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Ancient Studies program records were created by the members of the program and transfered to the College Archives over a period of time.
